title: go.talks/present: The system cannot find the path specified.
body:
On Win7/amd64:

cd %GOPATH%\src\code.google.com\p\go.talks

visit http://127.0.0.1:3999/2013%5cadvconc.slide#3 in Chrome,
can't open advconc\gopherswim.jpg.

C:\go\go-path\src\code.google.com\p\go.talks>present
2013/07/12 21:09:55 Open your web browser and visit http://127.0.0.1:3999/
2013/07/12 21:10:05 open advconc\gopherswim.jpg: The system cannot find the path
specified.
2013/07/12 21:10:05 open advconc\race.png: The system cannot find the path specified.
2013/07/12 21:10:05 open advconc\gopherswrench.jpg: The system cannot find the path
specified.
2013/07/12 21:10:05 open advconc\gopherhat.jpg: The system cannot find the path
specified.
